response.original_title: Mǐn Jiāng: As the River Flows
response.overview: Mǐn Jiāng – As the River Flows. Mǐn Jiāng is the mother river of the Fujian province in China. Fujian local Ruan and his friend kayaked through the mother river from the source to mouth. The duo kayaked through the vein of the river, crossing countless dams and documenting the impacts of an evolving culture on an ancient water source.
response.title: Mǐn Jiāng: As the River Flows
